original_text: ‘This is what I covenanted with you when you came out of Egypt. And my Spirit remains among you. Do not fear.’
korean_text: 너희가 애굽에서 나올 때에 내가 너희와 언약한 말과 나의 영이 계속하여 너희 가운데에 머물러 있나니 너희는 두려워하지 말지어다

sentences.original_text: 'This is what I covenanted with you
when you came out of Egypt.'
And my Spirit remains among you.
